INSERT INTO project (projectNo, projectName, projectStartDate, projectEndDate, projectStatus, projectCompanyName, projectContent, projectDeleted, empId) values (#{projectNo},#{projectName},#{projectStartDate},#{projectEndDate},#{projectStatus},#{projectCompanyName}, #{projectContent},#{projectDeleted},#{empId})
mapper.select: select * from project where projectNo >0 order by projectNo desc

select e.empId, e.empName, e.empRank, eif.roleNo, eif.teamno,eif.empTel, eif.empEmail from emp e inner Join (select empId, roleNo, teamNo, empTel,empEmail from empInfo where roleNo=#{roleNo} and teamNo in (select teamNo from team where projectNo =#{projectNo})) eif on e.empId = eif.empid
